About

Issue & Solution

Issue: When deploying Drupal site on different virtual host each in different directory than the images will not load due to path change

Solution:

The Virtual Hosty takes care of the virtual directory for all images, so that deploying site in different virtual directories, the images load accordingly

About

The Virtual Host reads all the image path and updates the path if site runs from virtual directory accordingly. In the following is overview:

  1. provides global JS variable 'BASE_URL', so you can pass in other JS libraries
  2. Updates each img path with virtual directory at the time page is loaded

JS Path

Path referenced in JS should be as following:
var path = BASE_URL + "sites/default/files/IMAG-NAME.png";

The variable "BASE_URL" will include the virtual directory
